insurance_company: State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company

liability.description: Covers bodily injury and property damage for which any insured becomes legally responsible due to an auto accident.

medical_payments.description: Covers reasonable medical expenses for injuries sustained by an insured in an auto accident, regardless of fault.

uninsured_underinsured_motorist.description: Covers bodily injury caused by a motorist who has no insurance or insufficient insurance.

collision.description: Covers damage to the covered vehicle caused by collision with another vehicle or object.

comprehensive.description: Covers damage to the covered vehicle not caused by collision, including theft, vandalism, fire, hail, or falling objects.

exclusions: Use of a vehicle without permission.
general_conditions: Policy changes must be approved by us in writing.
The policy may be canceled by either party with appropriate notice.
Fraud or misrepresentation may void the policy.

thank_you_message: Thank you for choosing State FarmÂ®.
